1D9E2CFB.He’s the brother of our local: :  Aldara. This amulet… this could be the cause of the sickness. It would explain why we've been powerless to fight it. If you can get hold of Aldara's amulet, I can break the power and cleanse the curse from it.

8EB31D08.Line1.1028C3: The journal also says something about Aldara's plans to hide amongst the heretics in Light's Refuge if things went badly here. Perhaps you should look for her there?
